G5315.def: to consume food, usually solids, but also liquids{N:001}

G740.def: a relatively small and generally round loaf of bread (considerably smaller than present-day typical loaves of bread and thus more like rolls or buns)

G4286.def: (derivative of προτίθεμαι[a] ‘to plan in advance,’ {D:30.62}) that which is planned or purposed in advance

G3739.def: a relative reference to any entity, event, or state, either occurring overtly in the immediate context or clearly implied in the discourse or setting

G1832.def: to mark an event as being possible in a highly generic sense

G1487.def: a marker of a condition, real or hypothetical, actual or contrary to fact

G2409.def: (derivative of {L:ἱερουργέω<SDBG:ἱερουργέω:000000>} or {L:ἱερατεύω<SDBG:ἱερατεύω:000000>} ‘to serve as a priest,’ {D:53.85}) one who performs religious rites and duties on behalf of others

G1325.def: to give an object, usually implying value

G4862.def: a marker of an associative relation, often involving joint participation in some activity{N:001}

G846.def: pertaining to that which is identical to something

G2036.def: to speak or talk, with apparent focus upon the content of what is said

G846.def: pertaining to that which is identical to something

G3588.def: a reference to an entity, event, or state, clearly identified by the linguistic or non-linguistic context of the utterance{N:001}

G4521.def: the seventh or last day of the week (religiously the most important since it was consecrated to the worship of God)

G1223.def: (with the genitive) a marker of intermediate agent, with implicit or explicit causative agent

glosses: (in the singular) person, human being, individual

16.gl: (in the singular) person, human being, individual

26.gl: (in the singular) person, human being, individual

G5620.def: a marker of result, often in contexts implying an intended or indirect purpose{N:001}

G3588.def: a reference to an entity, event, or state, clearly identified by the linguistic or non-linguistic context of the utterance{N:001}

glosses: (in the singular) person, human being, individual

G2962.def: (a title for God and for Christ) one who exercises supernatural authority over mankind (see also {D:37.51})

G4521.def: the seventh or last day of the week (religiously the most important since it was consecrated to the worship of God)
